text:
Fortunately it appears that installing a subsequent CU doesn't bring back this
annoyance. I had uninstalled it from our Windows 2022 VM template then installed
the November CU and it's still not present.

metadata.topic: RE: Remove the Azure Arc Setup “feature” installed on Windows Server 2022 – Out of Office Hours
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] RE: Remove the Azure Arc Setup “feature” installed on Windows Server 2022 – Out of Office Hours
